query: SELECT * FROM island_guides WHERE slug = 'male-capital-city' LIMIT 1
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3FFv3TtDUeNbYDM.root --database JUCCYykxYWxAcNny3wop55 --execute SELECT * FROM island_guides WHERE slug = 'male-capital-city' LIMIT 1

rows.name: Male - The Capital City
rows.overview: The vibrant capital of Maldives, Male is a bustling city with colorful buildings, rich history, and local culture. Home to the iconic Friday Mosque and National Centre, Male offers a unique glimpse into Maldivian urban life.
rows.quickFacts: ["Population: ~200,000","Currency: Maldivian Rufiyaa (MVR)","Language: Dhivehi","Time Zone: GMT+5","Airport: Velana International","Best Months: Nov-Apr"]
rows.flightInfo: Fly into Velana International Airport (main international airport)
rows.speedboatInfo: 20 minutes by speedboat from airport to Male city
rows.ferryInfo: 30 minutes by ferry from airport to Male city
rows.topThingsToDo: ["Visit Friday Mosque","Explore Male City Centre","Shop at Local Markets","Relax at Artificial Beach","Visit National Centre","Try Local Cuisine"]
rows.foodCafes: ["Haveeru Restaurant","Seagull Cafe & Restaurant","Octopus Cafe","Local Fish Market","Street Food Stalls"]
rows.healthTips: ["Drink plenty of water","Use high SPF sunscreen","Stay hydrated","Avoid tap water in some areas","Travel insurance recommended"]
rows.threeDayItinerary: ["Day 1: Arrive at airport, transfer to Male, explore city centre and markets","Day 2: Snorkeling or diving tour, visit Friday Mosque, dinner at local restaurant","Day 3: Island hopping tour or beach relaxation, shopping, depart"]
rows.faq: ["Q: Is Male safe? A: Yes, Male is generally safe for tourists","Q: What is the best time to visit? A: November to April","Q: Do I need a visa? A: Most nationalities get 30-day visa on arrival","Q: What currency is used? A: Maldivian Rufiyaa (MVR)"]
